name: TrainofThought
description:
Train of Thought is a point and click, puzzle game where the player can view the thoughts of the main character Walter Levard. Walter is an English professor who's life course is about to take a drastic change.

When Walther is confronted by a member from an ancient religion who threatens his way of life. This sets him on a path to uncover the mysteries of Mithras and the real truth of the world.

Train of Thought is a student project which is still in development. I welcome feedback and encourage you to comment or even get in touch. Hope you enjoy it.
